metadata.title: YAPP
metadata.description: Yet another prompt app — but this one's good

auth.emailVerificationRequired: Please verify your email first. Check your inbox for the verification link.
auth.registerDescription: Sign up with your Google account
auth.checkEmailDescription: We sent a verification link to your email address
auth.checkEmailDescriptionWithMask: We sent a verification link to {maskedEmail}
auth.resendVerificationSuccess: Verification email sent. Check your inbox.
auth.resendVerificationFailed: Failed to resend. Please try again.
auth.resendVerificationSessionRequired: Sign in to resend your verification email.
auth.disposableEmailNotAllowed: Disposable email addresses are not allowed. Please use a permanent email.
auth.agreeToTerms: By creating an account you agree to our
auth.agreeToContinue: By continuing, you agree to our

chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?
chat.guestGreeting: Yet another prompt app — but this one's good

greetings.1: What would you like to explore?
greetings.2: Hi there! What's on your mind?
greetings.3: Ready to help. What do you need?
greetings.4: Hey! How can I assist you?
greetings.5: What can I help you with today?
greetings.6: Welcome! What are you working on?
greetings.7: Hi! What would you like to know?

chat.aiDisclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Double-check important responses.
chat.renameDialogDescription: Enter a new title for this conversation.
chat.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.

emptyState.title: Start a new conversation
emptyState.description: Click 'New Chat' to begin a conversation with the AI assistant.
emptyState.hint: You can have up to 25 conversations with 200 messages each.

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.quota: Daily token quota exceeded. Your quota will reset at midnight UTC.
errors.rateLimit: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment before sending another message.
errors.session: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page to continue.
errors.conversationLimit: Maximum conversations reached. Delete an old conversation from the sidebar to start a new one.

customization.favoriteModelsDescription: Favorites appear at the top of the model selector
customization.noFavorites: No favorites yet. Star models in the selector to add them.

verifyEmail.subject: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.preview: Verify your email address for YAPP
verifyEmail.heading: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.body: Thanks for signing up! Please verify your email address to get started. This link will expire in 24 hours.
verifyEmail.fallback: Or copy and paste this URL into your browser:
verifyEmail.footer: If you did not create an account with YAPP, you can safely ignore this email. Someone may have entered your email address by mistake.
